summary: ALL OF THE WIRE INSULATION ON THE MAIN ENGINE WIRING HARNESS HAD DECAYED.  SEVERE RISK OF FIRE.  APPARENTLY MERCEDES-BENZ USED BIO-DEGRADABLE WIRE INSULATION.  WHEN EXPOSED TO THE HEAT THAT IS IN THE ENGINE BAY, THE COATING COVERING THE WIRES DISINTEGRATES. VEHICLE HAS 90,000 MILES, ORIGINAL OWNER, NO ACCIDENTS.
